profile.objective: Identify 20-25 net-new buying signals for AI transformation and digital modernization.
inclusion_rules: Target institutions that are buyers/adopters, not vendors.
Prioritize strategic initiatives with implementation budget signals.
exclusion_rules: Exclude Tier-1 global banks, Big Tech, and top global consultancies.
